title: From windstorm to resilience: How Wa school is growing climate protection
desc: In an era where climate risks such as windstorms and erratic rainfall are intensifying across northern Ghana, one school in the Wa Municipality offers compelling evidence that simple, community-led interventions can deliver long-term climate resilience.

title: Berlin Film Festival Award Winners (Updating Live)
desc: Jury president Wim Wenders will present the Golden Bear for best film in the Berlin Film Festival's main competition, as winners are announced live.

title: Sacramento Republic sign MLS veteran midfielder Memo Rodriguez to free agent deal
desc: USL Championship side Sacramento Republic have signed former Houston Dynamo and Sporting Kansas City midfielder Memo Rodriguez, sources told GOAL. The Texan midfielder will pen a two year deal with the USL giants, who finished second in the Western Conference last season. It continues a busy winter for Sacramento, following the signing of Canada's Mark-Anthony Kaye.

title: Lil Jon's Son DJ Young Slade Laid to Rest on First Day of Ramadan
desc: DJ Young Slade -- Lil Jon's son -- was laid to rest this week after his father confirmed his death earlier this month.

title: Ubisoft Montpellier evacuated after bomb threat prompts police response

title: Pakistan-New Zealand Super Eights opener abandoned at T20 World Cup
desc: Persistent rain in Colombo forces abandonment of Pakistan’s game with New Zealand, which was to open Super Eights stage.

title: Indian influencer claims he and his wife were detained by immigration in South Korea and China in viral video
desc: Trending News: Sachin Awasthi, an Indian content creator says he was detained by immigration authorities in both South Korea and China while traveling with his wife..
